chapter.text:
You turn the corner.^3000 The janitor lays in front of you in a pool of his own blood.^5000 His head a few feet away slightly rocking back and forth.^1500 His eyes lifeless and empty.^5000 It all comes rushing back to you.^1500 You arenâ€™t safe.^1500

You hear footsteps down the hall.
